sentences.sContent: Why do we need optimal sleep?
sentences.sCn: 我们为什么需要最佳的睡眠？

sentences.sContent: However, if you want optimal shadow quality and performance, there are some additional things to consider.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, if you want optimal shadow quality and performance, there are some additional things to consider.
sentences.sCn: 不过，如果你想要最佳的阴影质量和性能，有一些其他的事情要考虑。

sentences.sContent: Although the optimal user path is a straight line from search and results to customization and purchase, the interface offers several detours from this route.
sentences.sContent_eng: Although the optimal user path is a straight line from search and results to customization and purchase, the interface offers several detours from this route.
sentences.sCn: 尽管最佳的用户路径是从搜索和结果到定制和购买的直线路径，但该界面却提供了一些迂回的路径。
